name: Cosmos 44. Chapter One
description:
Cosmos 44. Chapter One is top down shooter with horror elements. Explore the station, learn its secrets, kill unknown insectoids. Sci-fi-pixel (like ps1) environment will delight you with its visuals. A deep story will allow you to lift the veil of mystery of the space station. Gameplay - about 30+ minutes. Explore first-person some locations.

WASD - Move

Left MOUSE - shoot/interact

Right mouse - aim

13371337ddd@gmail.com - contact mail
